jobTitle: Wholesale Account Executive - Leading Beauty Brand
industry: Retail Health and Personal Care Products
description:
Job Title: Wholesale Account Executive

Position Type: Full-Time

Location: NYC | In-office Wednesday-Friday

Salary: $75,000-$85,000 base (depending on experience) + uncapped commission

Are you looking for an opportunity to work with a growing artistry brand and support a company that focuses on self-expression and innovation? If so, please continue reading!

This innovative and leading beauty brand is seeking a dynamic and results-driven Wholesale Account Executive to join their team. The ideal candidate will be a true sales professional with a proven track record of success and significant experience in the beauty industry. This role requires a proactive individual who is capable of driving new business and expanding the brand. If you are a creative and visionary leader, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities: 

* Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve and exceed revenue targets.
* Collaborate with clients to understand their needs, provide product knowledge, and offer customized solutions.
* Stay informed about market trends and competitors.
* Articulate the brand’s value proposition compellingly and persuasively.
* Provide in-depth product knowledge to clients, highlighting unique selling points and benefits.

Qualifications: 

* Demonstrated success in achieving and exceeding sales targets.
* Strong organizational skills with attention to detail.
* A well-spoken individual who can maintain strong relationships with retailers.
* Self-motivated and results-oriented.
* Excelled verbal and written communication skills.

At Monday Talent, we understand that not everyone has had the same opportunities to gain experience and develop their skills. We're committed to changing that. We partner with organizations that understand the importance of building diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplaces. If you are passionate about your work and eager to learn, we encourage you to apply even if you don't meet all the requirements listed in the job description.

Click 'Easy Apply' to be considered for this opportunity or share this job posting with a friend who may be interested and you could be eligible for our referral reward program!
